level.text: Parties, witnesses, and other persons may file appropriate motions, including motions to intervene or to join another party to the action.
A party filing a motion shall serve it on all parties to the hearing.

A party opposing a motion shall respond to the motion filed by hand delivering the response to the address set forth at ยง3103.9 within five (5) days of the date the motion was served, or by mailing the response to the address set forth at ยง3103.10 postmarked within five (5) days of the date the motion was served.
Failure to respond to a motion within the time provided in ยง3108.3 shall constitute sufficient grounds for the ALJ, in the ALJ’s discretion, to grant the original motion as being unopposed.
Unless a party requests oral argument on a motion and the ALJ grants the request, the ALJ may dispose of the motion on written submissions.
The ALJ may schedule a separate hearing on a motion or may consider it at the time of the hearing on the NOI.
